channel.title: Nividia/Pk/Is/Back/714/Items/Sum/Dung/New/Features/Vps/Hosted
channel.description:
Owner: Braves Co/Owner: Z Moderators: Mikey Admins: None
THIS IS PURE PKING SERVER THE BEST PKING OVERLOADS AND OLDSCHOOL PKING
We are 24/7 vps hosted with 10gb ram secruity bots this is new server just released need staff and good website designers if possible come join its amazing pking/skilling server alot of added new features and such will cya on there im currently doing webclient now thanks
WebClient: http://rswebclients.com/play/Nividia%20Pk
Fourms: www.nividiax.freeforums.org
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?dcuoym6oh7a906w
If any problems or if anyone knows how to code or good with websites add my msn and messege me brav3s@live.ca thanks In f[size=12pt][pre]Nividia Pk Features:[/pre][/size]
[ul][li] Always lots of people online![/li] [li] Fully working godwars bosses + minions![/li] [li] Working Highscores![/li] [li] Working Vote system with misc or cash reward![/li] [li] Custom training areas[/li] [li] Pest Control almost 100%![/li] [li] Duel arena[/li] [li] Custom PVP (Lumbridge, Falador, and Cammy)[/li] [li] 95% accurate combat formula, and all weapons specs work and attack correctly![/li] [li] Custom items such as dragon cape and water cape![/li] [li] Awesome custom donator area with custom Nividia Pk 317 only boss npcs with great drops[/li] [li] KQ 80% accurate[/li] [li] Custom skiller area and custom Nividia Pk 317 only tools![/li] [li] Lots of updated 474+ models and animations!(we are a 317 deob)[/li] [li] Sexy Custom Interfaces[/li] [li] Full 100% Skillcapes![/li] [li] Always new updates, content, and fixes for the server and client![/li][/ul] o
rmation: Real 474 no 508+ Real godwars Real barrows Real pest control Improved slayer Good exp rate's Stable economy Skillcape emotes All skills work Bosses One wave jad All Spirit Shields Arcane stream necklace Dragon platebody Dragonfire Shield Spirit shield's Korasi Torva Pernix Chaotic longsword
